document_api_meta.title: Publish Global Product
document_api_meta.env_desc:
Publish and convert a global product to local products in one or multiple shops in supported markets. After publishing, the product is sent for review by TikTok Shop in the respective markets. For sellers in the EU market, the provided information will also be automatically translated into all EU languages supported by TikTok Shop.
**Note**: 
- You can only publish in each market once. To change product information, edit the global product by using the [Edit Global Product API](6509e1bcc16ffe02b8dc3cd7). The changes will be automatically synchronized to all markets where the product is published
- Use the [Get Product API](6509d85b4a0bb702c057fdda) to obtain the converted local product information in the target market's language. 
- Use the [Edit Product API](6509da7d0fcef602bf1caddf) or [Partial Edit Product API](650a98d74a0bb702c06c3289) to edit the local product information, if necessary.

request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The seller access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 0. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a344ddec3030b238fa0) to get seller access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_body_param.name: publish_target
request_body_param.desc: Target markets for publishing global products.

request_body_param.name: ^region
request_body_param.desc:
The new market where you want to publish the global product.
Possible values:
- DE: Germany
- ES: Spain
- FR: France
- GB: United Kingdom
- ID: Indonesia
- IE: Ireland
- IT: Italy
- JP: Japan
- MY: Malaysia
- PH: Philippines
- SG: Singapore
- TH: Thailand
- US: United States
- VN: Vietnam
- MX: Mexico

**Note**: You can only publish in each market once.

request_body_param.name: ^responsible_person_ids
request_body_param.desc:
A comma-delimited list of responsible person IDs. Retrieve the IDs from the [Search Responsible Persons API](67066a55f17b7d02f95d2fb1).
Default: The IDs provided when the global product was created.
**Note**: Applicable only for the EU market in certain categories. Use the [Get Global Category Rules API](650a056df1fd3102b91b5b8e) to check the requirements.

request_body_param.name: ^manufacturer_ids
request_body_param.desc:
A comma-delimited list of manufacturer IDs. Retrieve the IDs from the [Search Manufacturers API](67066a580dcee902fa03ccf9).
Default: The IDs provided when the global product was created.
**Note**: Applicable only for the EU market in certain categories. Use the [Get Global Category Rules API](650a056df1fd3102b91b5b8e) to check the requirements.

request_body_param.name: ^skus
request_body_param.desc:
The SKUs to be published in the specified market.
- Max SKUs for EU, JP, UK, US: 300
- Max SKUs for other regions: 100

request_body_param.name: ^^related_global_sku_id
request_body_param.desc:
The global SKU ID to be published.
After publishing, a corresponding local product SKU will be created and linked to the global SKU.

request_body_param.name: ^^price
request_body_param.desc:
The SKU's local pricing information in the specified market.

**Note**:
- Provide this only if you want to manually override the default local prices, which are automatically calculated from the global uniform price. 
- Specify either `amount` or `sale_price`, the other will be auto-filled. If both are provided, `sale_price` takes precedence.
- JP and US shops using China warehouses must provide `price.sale_price`.

request_body_param.name: ^^^amount
request_body_param.desc:
The SKU's **local pre-tax price**. This excludes any applicable charges such as cross-border shipping costs, taxes, and other fees, and therefore does not appear on the product page.
Refer to [Product Pricing](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/67e1288d76cfee049d9af858) for the allowed price ranges in each market.

**Note**:  Not applicable for JP and US shops using China warehouses, please use `price.sale_price` instead.

request_body_param.name: ^^^currency
request_body_param.desc:
The currency. You can use the local currency or USD.
Possible values:
- EUR: France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Spain
- GBP: United Kingdom
- IDR: Indonesia
- JPY: Japanese
- MYR: Malaysia
- PHP: Philippines
- SGD: Singapore
- THB: Thailand
- USD: United States
- VND: Vietnam
- MXN: Mexico

request_body_param.name: ^^^sale_price
request_body_param.desc:
The SKU's **local display price** shown on the product page before any discounts. 
Refer to [Product Pricing](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/67e1288d76cfee049d9af858) for the allowed price ranges in each market.

**Note**: 
-  Required for JP and US shops using China warehouses, optional for others.
- This is the definitive final price shown on the product page, all other prices will be ignored.

request_body_param.name: ^^inventory
request_body_param.desc:
SKU inventory information per warehouse.
Required for sellers without multiple warehouses, optional for others.

**Note*: If inventory details are not provided, the global SKU quantity will be evenly split among all markets, and any surplus will be added to the last published product SKU.

request_body_param.name: ^^^warehouse_id
request_body_param.desc:
The warehouse ID. Retrieve this value from the [Get Warehouse List API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/650aa418defece02be6e66b6).

Default:
- Sellers without multiple warehouses: The available warehouses will be used, prioritizing local warehouses in the specified market over warehouses in the seller's base country.
- Sellers with multiple warehouses: The global warehouse ID

request_body_param.name: ^^^quantity
request_body_param.desc:
The SKU quantity available in the warehouse.
Valid range: [1, 99,999]

**Note**: If the local SKU inventory quantity exceeds the global SKU quantity, the global SKU quantity will be updated to be the sum of all local inventories.

request_body_param.name: ^^fees
request_body_param.desc: The fees required for this product based on TikTok Shop policies. Fees are required only for certain product categories, retrieve the requirements from the [Get Category Rules API](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6509c0febace3e02b74594a9).

request_body_param.name: ^^^type
request_body_param.desc:
The type of fee.
Possible values: PFAND

request_body_param.name: ^^^amount
request_body_param.desc:
The fee amount.
Valid range:
- PFAND: [0.00 - 6300.00]

request_body_param.name: ^^^additional_attribute
request_body_param.desc:
An optional attribute that provides additional context for the fee. The accepted values may vary by fee type and market.

Possible values for Pfand:
- SINGLE_USE
- REUSABLE
- NOT_APPLICABLE

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: request_id
response_param.desc: Request log

response_param.name: data
response_param.desc: Specific return information

response_param.name: ^products
response_param.desc: The local products converted from the global product.

response_param.name: ^^region
response_param.desc:
The market where the product is published.
Possible values:
- DE: Germany
- ES: Spain
- FR: France
- GB: United Kingdom
- ID: Indonesia
- IE: Ireland
- IT: Italy
- JP: Japan
- MY: Malaysia
- PH: Philippines
- SG: Singapore
- TH: Thailand
- US: United States
- VN: Vietnam
- MX: Mexico

response_param.name: ^^shop_id
response_param.desc: The ID of the local shop in the specified market. One market can only have one local shop.

response_param.name: ^^skus
response_param.desc: The newly created local SKUs in the specified market.

response_param.name: ^^^related_global_sku_id
response_param.desc: The associated global SKU ID.

response_param.name: ^^^id
response_param.desc: The newly generated local SKU ID.

response_param.name: ^^^seller_sku
response_param.desc: An internal code/name for managing SKUs, not visible to buyers.

response_param.name: ^^^sale_attributes
response_param.desc: A list of attributes  (e.g. size, color, length) that define each variant of a product.

response_param.name: ^^^^id
response_param.desc: The newly generated local sales attribute ID.

response_param.name: ^^^^value_id
response_param.desc: The newly generated local sales attribute value ID.

response_param.name: ^^id
response_param.desc: The newly generated local product ID.

response_param.name: ^publish_result
response_param.desc: Results of publishing the global product.

response_param.name: ^^region
response_param.desc:
The market where the product is published.
Possible values:
- DE: Germany
- ES: Spain
- FR: France
- GB: United Kingdom
- ID: Indonesia
- IE: Ireland
- IT: Italy
- JP: Japan
- MY: Malaysia
- PH: Philippines
- SG: Singapore
- TH: Thailand
- US: United States
- VN: Vietnam
- MX: Mexico

response_param.name: ^^status
response_param.desc:
The status of publishing the product to the market.
Possible values:
- SUCCESS: The global product was successfully published to the local shop, submitted for listing, and is now under review.
- DRAFT: The global product was saved as a draft local product due to validation errors.
- FAILED: Synchronization of the global product to the local shop was unsuccessful.

response_param.name: ^^fail_reasons
response_param.desc: The list of errors that occurred.

response_param.name: ^^^message
response_param.desc: The error message.

error_code_list.msg: Seller is inactive
product price is invalid
Unable to publish or sync products to target markets due to missing or invalid warehouse details.
Multiple warehouses detected. Include all warehouse IDs and the corresponding details and try again.
product status is invalid
calculate price error
The product ID does not exist.
region already published
The SKU inventory quantity for the warehouse must be within allowed limits.
The provided currency is not available for this shop/region.
seller publish global product over limit and save draft
activity warehouse not allowed to be deleted
The specified inventory quantity is too low. It must be greater than the locked quantity (e.g. for committed orders, campaigns, creators) to ensure a non-negative available stock.
The product ID does not exist
the cover region of share warehouse can not cover the the product region
Missing 'sale price' value
The warehouse is disabled.
The SKU id not exist.
The seller is inactive.
do not support cross-boarder seller create local product directly
Internal error. Please try again. If the issue persists after multiple attempts, please contact platform support.
The product in its current status is not available for this operation. Change the product status and try again.
The publish region is inactive.
Invalid input parameters. Refer to the API documentation for details.

sample_code.label: Go
sample_code.value:
// For more details about the SDK, refer to the documentation:
// https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/67c83e0799a75104986ae498
func product202309PublishGlobalProductPost() {
    configuration := apis.NewConfiguration()
    configuration.AddAppInfo(appKey, appSecret)
    apiClient := apis.NewAPIClient(configuration)
    request := apiClient.ProductV202309API.Product202309GlobalProductsGlobalProductIdPublishPost(context.Background(), "1729592969712207008")
    request = request.XTtsAccessToken("your access token")
    request = request.ContentType("application/json")
    product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBody := product_v202309.NewProduct202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBody()
    product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTarget := product_v202309.NewProduct202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTarget()
    product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTarget.SetRegion("MY")
    product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTargetResponsiblePersonIdsList := []string{"67726293bf1eb1e92401a"}
    product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTarget.SetResponsiblePersonIds(product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTargetResponsiblePersonIdsList)
    product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTargetManufacturerIdsList := []string{"67726293bf1eb1e92401a"}
    product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTarget.SetManufacturerIds(product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTargetManufacturerIdsList)
    product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTargetSkus := product_v202309.NewProduct202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTargetSkus()
    product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTargetSkus.SetRelatedGlobalSkuId("1729592969712207400")
    product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTargetSkusPrice := product_v202309.NewProduct202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTargetSkusPrice()
    product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTargetSkusPrice.SetAmount("10.01")
    product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTargetSkusPrice.SetCurrency("MYR")
    product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTargetSkusPrice.SetSalePrice("100.00")
    product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTargetSkus.SetPrice(*product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTargetSkusPrice)
    product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTargetSkusInventory := product_v202309.NewProduct202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTargetSkusInventory()
    product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTargetSkusInventory.SetWarehouseId("7068517275539719942")
    product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTargetSkusInventory.SetQuantity(999)
    product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTargetSkus.SetInventory(*product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTargetSkusInventory)
    product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTargetSkusFees := product_v202309.NewProduct202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTargetSkusFees()
    product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTargetSkusFees.SetType("PFAND")
    product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTargetSkusFees.SetAmount("1.01")
    product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTargetSkusFees.SetAdditionalAttribute("SINGLE_USE")
    product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTargetSkusFeesList := []product_v202309.Product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTargetSkusFees{*product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTargetSkusFees}
    product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTargetSkus.SetFees(product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTargetSkusFeesList)
    product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTargetSkusList := []product_v202309.Product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTargetSkus{*product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTargetSkus}
    product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTarget.SetSkus(product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTargetSkusList)
    product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTargetList := []product_v202309.Product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTarget{*product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTarget}
    product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBody.SetPublishTarget(product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBodyPublishTargetList)
    request = request.Product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBody(*product202309PublishGlobalProductRequestBody)
    resp, httpResp, err := request.Execute()
    if err != nil || httpResp.StatusCode != 200 {
        fmt.Printf("productsRequest err:%v resbody:%s", err, httpResp.Body)
        return
    }
    if resp == nil {
        fmt.Printf("response is nil")
        return
    }
    if resp.GetCode()!= 0 {
        fmt.Printf("response business is error, errorCode:%d errorMessage:%s", resp.GetCode(), resp.GetMessage())
        return
    }
    respDataJson, _ := json.MarshalIndent(resp.GetData(), "", "  ")
    fmt.Println("response data:", string(respDataJson))
    return
}

Java

scope_list.package_description: The Partner will be able to manage seller's global product information, etc.
scope_list.auth_info: The Partner will be able to manage your global product, including sku, stock, etc.
